data.title: Kristin Scott Thomas
data.meta_description: The latest Kristin Scott Thomas news, blogs and videos on Metro
data.text:
Comic Relief 2019: When is it, who is presenting, and what is the schedule for Red Nose Day?

Get your bank cards and a big bowl of popcorn at the ready.

When is Red Nose Day 2019 as Four Weddings sequel is confirmed?

It follows on from the RND Love Actually sequel.

Ryan Gosling’s Only God Forgives is a violent thriller that lacks substance

Ryan Gosling is a man of few words in Only God Forgives, a violent thriller that lacks substance.

Kristin Scott Thomas: The difference between 40 and 50 is that I don’t have anything to prove

Forget her buttoned-up persona, Kristin Scott Thomas is no ice queen.

Only God Forgives showcases stunning visuals in UK trailer

Ryan Gosling's much-anticipated movie Only God Forgives has debuted another new trailer - this one aimed specifically at the UK market.

Only God Forgives is a beautiful nightmare that will test your patience

Heavy on violence, light on dialogue and frustratingly lacking any real substance, Only God Forgives will test your patience, but it's a delirious nightmare composed with artistic brilliance that will still floor you.

Ryan Gosling looks mean and moody in new Only God Forgives photos

New photos have been released of Ryan Gosling's Only God Forgives showing the actor looking mean and moody.

Five Questions For…François Ozon

Are Trance, G.I. Joe: Retaliation and In The House worth a watch?

Swap the office for the silver screen with our faves to see at the cinema

Ryan Gosling looks ready for a fight in new Only God Forgives pictures

Ryan Gosling looks ready for action in a brand new photo from his forthcoming film Only God Forgives.

Leaving will melt Kristin Scott Thomas’s ice-queen image

Film review: In Leaving (15, running time: 85min), Kristin Scott Thomas's rapturous performance equals her astonishing turn in I've Loved You So Long.

Kristin Scott Thomas is style icon

Kristin Scott Thomas can add a new accolade to her mantelpiece - the Bafta-winning actress has been named Good Housekeeping's best dressed style icon.

Kristin Scott Thomas in musical

Kristin Scott Thomas has decided to try her hand at a musical for the first time in her career.

Scott Thomas cast as Lennon’s aunt

Kristin Scott Thomas will star as John Lennon's Aunt Mimi in a biopic about the Beatle.

Bafta nod for Kristin’s film

Kristin Scott Thomas's latest movie has been nominated for a Bafta.

Kristin Scott Thomas: I’m groggy

Kristin Scott Thomas has revealed she can't believe she's received a Golden Globe nomination.

Satellite nod for Ricky Gervais

Ricky Gervais, Kate Winslet, Kristin Scott Thomas and Sophie Okonedo have received nominations in the 13th annual Satellite Awards.
